name: Systemic Surg Seq
title: RX Summ Systemic/Surgery Sequence
rows: No systemic therapy and/or surgical procedures; unknown if surgery and/or systemic therapy given
Systemic therapy both before and after surgery
Intraoperative systemic therapy with other therapy administered before and/or after surgery
Surgery both before and after systemic therapy
Sequence unknown, but both surgery and systemic therapy given
